summary.span: Specifies the available application-specific .

span.span: Specifies the available application-specific .

remarks.format: ## Remarks ## XAML 文字用法XAML Text Usage 這個類別通常不是在 XAML 中使用。This class is not typically used in XAML. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何在識別手勢。The following example demonstrates how to identify a gesture on an . 這個範例假設有呼叫`inkCanvas1`且其事件已連接到在此範例中的事件處理常式。This example assumes that there is an called `inkCanvas1` and that its event has been connected to the event handler in this example. [!code-csharp[GestureSample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/GestureSample/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#1)] [!code-vb[GestureSample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/GestureSample/VisualBasic/Window1.xaml.vb#1)]
